description: Computes voxelwise weighted and binary degree centrality and stores the result in a new 3D bucket dataset as floats to preserve their values. Degree centrality reflects the strength and extent of the correlation of a voxel with every other voxel in the brain.

autoclip.title: Autoclip
autoclip.description: Clip off low-intensity regions in the dataset.

automask.title: Automask
automask.description: Mask the dataset to target brain-only voxels.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Mask file to mask input data.

oned_file.title: Oned file
oned_file.description: Output filepath to text dump of correlation matrix.

sparsity.title: Sparsity
sparsity.description: Only take the top percent of connections.

thresh.title: Thresh
thresh.description: Threshold to exclude connections where corr <= thresh.
